english_translation: You might jump and come across the seven seas
If there is no beating/throbbing heart (Miḍiva Mana), what happiness is there in coming?

kannada_original: ಜನ ಒಂದೆ, ದನಿ ಒಂದೆ ; ಭಾವನೆಯ ಪರಿ ಬೇರೆ
english_transliteration: Jana onde, dani onde; bhāvaneya pari bēre
english_translation: People are one, the voice is one; the nature of feeling is different
Become one with the universe – Muddu Rama.
